page.title: 19GAMES
page.content: At playtime we always play many games but we always play {football}.We have the top class versus everybody else. People who do not like football play {Chainy}.One person is "on" and if they catch someone else they hold hands and they run and try and catch other people to make the chain longer.When everyone is in the chain we start again. Sometimes we play {Bulldog}.You have to across the playground without getting caught by the other side.If you get caught and you can't get away within ten seconds you are on with the other side. Girls usually join in the same games as the boys though they also play {Skittle Ball}.Some girls play football.
